alert.note: Alert for Meigs; Rhea; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 3:03AM CDT until April 01 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Rhea County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Meigs County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Roane County in east Tennessee... * Until 445 AM EDT. * At 402 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pikeville, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rockwood, Spring City, Peakland, Stinging Fork Falls State Park, Eagle Furnace, Piney Falls State Park, Grandview and Ten Mile. This includes Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 341 and 343. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM EDT for east Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
